cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoho

sentence.kanji: 英語を初歩から勉強しています。
sentence.romaji: eigo wo shoho kara benkyou shite imasu
sentence.english: I'm studying English from the beginning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uten

sentence.kanji: 試合は雨天中止です。
sentence.romaji: shiai ha uten chuushi desu
sentence.english: The match is canceled due to rain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ooame

sentence.kanji: 各地で大雨が降っています。
sentence.romaji: kakuchi de ooame ga fute imasu
sentence.english: Heavy rain is falling in all regions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuuritsu

sentence.kanji: 私は中立の立場を取っています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha chuuritsu no tachiba wo tote imasu
sentence.english: I'm taking a neutral standpoint.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tachidomaru

sentence.kanji: 人々は立ち止まって上を見上げたの。
sentence.romaji: hitobito ha tachidomate ue wo miageta no
sentence.english: People stopped in their tracks and looked up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's keten

sentence.kanji: 欠点のない人間はいません。
sentence.romaji: keten no nai ningen ha imasen
sentence.english: No person is without faults.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakeru

sentence.kanji: お気に入りのカップが欠けてしまいました。
sentence.romaji: okiniiri no kapu ga kakete shimaimashita
sentence.english: My favorite cup has been chipped.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimai

sentence.kanji: うちは3人姉妹です。
sentence.romaji: uchi ha sannin shimai desu
sentence.english: There are three girls in my family, myself and two sisters.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shiritsu

sentence.kanji: 娘は市立の学校に通っています。
sentence.romaji: musume ha shiritsu no gakou ni kayote imasu
sentence.english: My daughter goes to a municipal school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsugitsugini

sentence.kanji: 走者が次々にゴールしました。
sentence.romaji: sousha ga tsugitsugini go-ru shimashita
sentence.english: Runners reached the goal one after another.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tachiagaru

sentence.kanji: 彼は急に立ち上がったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kyuu ni tachiagata no
sentence.english: He suddenly stood up.

cards.english: at the beginning of the month
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsukihajime

sentence.kanji: いつも月初めに彼と会います。
sentence.romaji: itsumo tsukihajime ni kare to aimasu
sentence.english: I always meet him at the beginning of the month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shonichi

sentence.kanji: 会議の初日に市長がスピーチをしたよ。
sentence.romaji: kaigi no shonichi ni shichou ga supi-chi wo shita yo
sentence.english: The mayor made a speech on the first day of the conference.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amagu

sentence.kanji: 雨具の用意を忘れないように。
sentence.romaji: amagu no youi wo wasurenai you ni
sentence.english: Don't forget to prepare your rainwear.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tachinaoru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は失敗から立ち直ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha shipai kara tachinaota yo
sentence.english: She recovered from the failure.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoka

sentence.kanji: 初夏の高原は気持ちがいいですね。
sentence.romaji: shoka no kougen ha kimochi ga ii desu ne
sentence.english: Being up on the high plateaus in early summer feels good.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikaku

sentence.kanji: 日本語を教える資格を取りたいです。
sentence.romaji: nihongo wo oshieru shikaku wo toritai desu
sentence.english: I want to get a license to teach Japanese.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shi

sentence.kanji: その市の人口は減り続けているの。
sentence.romaji: sono shi no jinkou ha heritsuzukete iru no
sentence.english: The population of the city keeps decreasing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsugu

sentence.kanji: 彼はトップに次ぐ好成績でした。
sentence.romaji: kare ha topu ni tsugu kouseiseki deshita
sentence.english: His excellent results were next to the top.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiritsu

sentence.kanji: あの会社との契約が成立しました。
sentence.romaji: ano kaisha to no keiyaku ga seiritsu shimashita
sentence.english: We concluded a contract with that company.

cards.english: look from one to another, compare
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mikuraberu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は二人の顔を見比べたの。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha futari no kao wo mikurabeta no
sentence.english: She looked alternately at the two of them, reading their faces.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seihin

sentence.kanji: 当社の製品は3年間の保障つきです。
sentence.romaji: tousha no seihin ha sannenkan no hoshoutsuki desu
sentence.english: Our company's products come with a three-year guarantee.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mazeru

sentence.kanji: カレーにヨーグルトを入れて、よく混ぜてください。
sentence.romaji: kare- ni yo-guruto wo irete yoku mazete kudasai
sentence.english: Please put the yogurt in the curry, and mix it well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mazaru

sentence.kanji: 水と油は混ざりません。
sentence.romaji: mizu to abura ha mazarimasen
sentence.english: Water and oil don't mix.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's eien

sentence.kanji: 平和は人類の永遠のテーマです。
sentence.romaji: heiwa ha jinrui no eien no te-ma desu
sentence.english: Peace is an eternal issue for human beings.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tekisuru

sentence.kanji: 彼はこの仕事に適しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kono shigoto ni tekishiteimasu
sentence.english: He's suitable for this work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naritatsu

sentence.kanji: この島は観光で成り立っています。
sentence.romaji: kono shima ha kankou de naritate imasu
sentence.english: This island is built on sightseeing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konran

sentence.kanji: 地震の後、町は大混乱だったよ。
sentence.romaji: jishin no ato machi ha daikonran data yo
sentence.english: After the earthquake, the town was in pandemonium.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's obi

sentence.kanji: この帯は長過ぎます。
sentence.romaji: kono obi ha naga sugimasu
sentence.english: This sash is too long.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shigen

sentence.kanji: 地球の資源を守りましょう。
sentence.romaji: chikyuu no shigen wo mamorimashou
sentence.english: Let's protect the earth's resources.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuudachi

sentence.kanji: 帰宅中、夕立にあったの。
sentence.romaji: kitakuchuu yuudachi ni ata no
sentence.english: I was caught in a shower while coming home.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uraguchi

sentence.kanji: 裏口へお回りください。
sentence.romaji: uraguchi he omawari kudasai
sentence.english: Please go around to the back door.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisui

sentence.kanji: 海水から塩を作ります。
sentence.romaji: kaisui kara shio wo tsukurimasu
sentence.english: Salt is made from seawater.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's uragiru

sentence.kanji: 彼は仲間を裏切ったの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nakama wo uragita no
sentence.english: He betrayed his friends.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mina

sentence.kanji: 私の昇進を皆が喜んでくれたの。
sentence.romaji: watashi no shoushin wo mina ga yorokonde kureta no
sentence.english: Everyone was pleased with my promotion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansou

sentence.kanji: 冬は空気が乾燥しますね。
sentence.romaji: fuyu ha kuuki ga kansou shimasu ne
sentence.english: The air in winter is dry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tekisetsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は適切な言葉で説明してくれました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tekisetsu na kotoba de setsumei shite kuremashita
sentence.english: He explained it to me in appropriate terms.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hara

sentence.kanji: 腹が減って動けない。
sentence.romaji: hara ga hete ugokenai
sentence.english: I'm too hungry to move.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hai

sentence.kanji: 彼は肺の病気にかかったのよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hai no byouki ni kakata no yo
sentence.english: He contracted lung disease.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senaka

sentence.kanji: 背中がかゆいです。
sentence.romaji: senaka ga kayui desu
sentence.english: My back itches.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's majiru

sentence.kanji: 電話の声に雑音が混じっていたの。
sentence.romaji: denwa no koe ni zatsuon ga majite ita no
sentence.english: The voice on the phone was mixed with background noise.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's meishi

sentence.kanji: 私たちは名刺を交換しました。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha meishi wo koukan shimashita
sentence.english: We exchanged business cards.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haba

sentence.kanji: この道は幅が狭いので気をつけて運転してください。
sentence.romaji: kono michi ha haba ga semai no de ki wo tsukete unten shite kudasai
sentence.english: This road is narrow so please drive carefully.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaijou

sentence.kanji: 海上で衝突事故が発生した。
sentence.romaji: kaijou de shoutotsu jiko ga hasei shita
sentence.english: There was a collision at sea.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tensai

sentence.kanji: 天災を防ぐことはできません。
sentence.romaji: tensai wo fusegu koto ha dekimasen
sentence.english: Natural disasters can't be prevented.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teki

sentence.kanji: あそこに敵がひそんでいる。
sentence.romaji: asoko ni teki ga hisonde iru
sentence.english: The enemy is lurking there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaku

sentence.kanji: 彼の態度は誠意を欠いています。
sentence.romaji: kare no taido ha seii wo kaite imasu
sentence.english: His attitude lacks sincerity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kane

sentence.kanji: この鐘の音はとてもきれいですね。
sentence.romaji: kono kane no ne ha totemo kirei desu ne
sentence.english: The sound of this bell is very beautiful.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tennen

sentence.kanji: ここは天然の温泉です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha tennen no onsen desu
sentence.english: This is a natural hot spring.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ten

sentence.kanji: 天から恵みの雨が降ったね。
sentence.romaji: ten kara megumi no ame ga futa ne
sentence.english: A welcome rain fell from the skies.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's korogasu

sentence.kanji: まず、肉をパン粉の上で転がします。
sentence.romaji: mazu niku wo panko no ue de korogashimasu
sentence.english: First of all, roll the meat in bread crumbs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itai

sentence.kanji: この辺一帯はリンゴ畑です。
sentence.romaji: kono hen itai ha ringobatake desu
sentence.english: The whole area here is apple orchards.
